Bash(# Move debug scripts
mv debug_*.py check_*.py test_*.py trace_*.py scripts/debug/ 2>/dev/null || true

# Move analysis scripts  
mv analyze_*.py find_*.py search_*.py scripts/analysis/ 2>/dev/null || true

# Move example/demo scripts
mv demo_*.py scripts/examples/ 2>/dev/null || true

# Move documentation
mv *_GUIDE.md *_FIX*.md docs/guides/ 2>/dev/null || true

# Move other utility scripts
mv run_*.py manual_*.py simple_test.py quick_check.py enhanced_market_researcher.py market_researcher.py direct_opportunity_finder.py investigate_market_api.py save_actual_response.py scripts/ 2>/dev/null || true

# Move data files
mv *.json *.html data/ 2>/dev/null || true

echo ""Files moved successfully!"")
